entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 12.
